Blog.post: I just learned that my stupid friend rebecca has a blog too. Its address is http://becca13.blogspot.com

Last night at the mall i got this awsome game called Conflict: Desert Storm. A bunch of my other friends went and i had to say goodbye to one of them. My stupid friend rebecca wont shut up about Soul Caliber 2 and I know its a good game but shes going overboard
8/27/03: i just created this blog... Wont this be fun...

Sorry i havent updated in like a month but ive been busy with school :P. Im just sitting here talking with my friends. i found this awsome song called "enter sandman" by metallica, it is really cool. Well se u later
Well i got this new computer for christmas and i finally found some time to get on the internet and update all my stuff so im updating my blog now
Ok i just found my account again so ill be posting again
ya this is a pointless post isnt it?
ya i got bored again so im writing crap in my blog. ya im also thinking about some shit. ya thats about it
Ya I got bored so im updating my blog. Ya thats about it. Yep. James u suck. Ya now thats it

*sigh* im kinda depressed now, i was really happy earlier but now im depressed b/c of what someone tould me, ehh o well it could be worse somehow, o and if you want to know why im depressed just ask me and pay attention, un like SOME people lol, well idk i might not tell you but then again i might tell you... Ya well im going to think of what im going to do for my birthday, its not like anyone would bother to come its just something to think about, ive narrowed it down to mall or movies, yep.... MALL or movies (im leaning towards mall just in case you didnt get that) but like i said, no one is going to come anyway.

YAY last day of band camp this week, only next week we have to go more but thats ok, we get 2 days off, damn like my whole body is sore now, anywho, ya rebecca needed a ride to band practice this afternoon and i think my neighbor scared her, lol but it was funny too, yay its almost my birthday (its auguest 7th for all you that dont kno) so ya get me something good unless you hate me and want me to burn in hell...lol im jk u dont have to do anything, im stupid anyway... yep.... haha "pimp my (insert computer here)" lol that was funny, ya well im getting tired of typing all this crap and no one posting comments so someone comment on this one, please!!!!! haha, i love your rebecca, *hugs rebecca*

WOOHOOO... ya incase you havent noticed, i feel so much better compared to my last post, thank you so much rebecca *hugs rebecca*, ya well ive got band practice tommrow at 8 am and here i am at 1:51 am still awake, yep, i better get some coffee tommrow morning, later

ya i still feel like shit and the fact that rebecca probobly thinks im a jerk/asshole/idiot isnt helping...ya its not a very good feeling, feeling like shit and being mad at yourself for acting like a retard and then haveing the person you love most likely thinking your a retard as well........>_
ehhh i feel shitty today for some reason, been thinking too much again...ya too much thought=bad...i love you rebecca *hugs rebecca*

GOD im such a dumbshit, i wanted to get up early this morning so i set all my alarms early and i tried to go to bed early (around 2) and i didnt fall asleep till after 3 and i just woke up, GOD someone just shoot me in the foot right now...
thanks for the comment rebecca, it took me a while to get it but now i do get it, thanks a lot *hugs rebecca* later

hah combat zone was really fun but i feel really stoned right now, i need some more caffeine, ya ill add some more to this post when ive got something to say... o ya, i wonder why women in brazil find me so attractive and american women think im ugly? i kno it confuses me too...

woohooo! im going to the lock-in at combat zone tonight! other than that nothings new except im happy right now, unlike the previous post, yay, thanks for all the comments rebecca (anonymous, lol) *hugs rebecca* later...o wait i forgot to add that i killed bill last night on battlefield, not bill gates, bill clinton lol ok thats it

*sigh* ya idk what im doing posting, i dont have anything to say besides im kinda sad right now, i dont even kno why, everything is going great right now, o well, ill go kill some ppl on battlefield and ill probobly feel better

ya well for the last few hours ive been a little gnome living in my room playing battlefield 1942 and telling my brother and his gay friend to shut the hell up. Yep thats about all ive done today besides this, i havent even turned on the tv yet, said, aint it? Thanks for all the comments rebecca (aka anonymous, lol) they really mean a lot *hugs rebecca* well ill post more later...

yay today was fun, i got a WORKING version of battlefield 1942 and i got to be used as a human target for bottlerockets and i got it on film, lol im such a retarted bastard, ill write more later, love you rebecca *hugs rebecca*
woah, i don't have anything to talk about, hmmmm..... well nothing other than the usually that is, I love you rebecca *hugs rebecca* later
Its all good...yep. I like just woke up and ya thats about it. Thanks for all the comment things *hugs rebecca*, ill post more later today.....

god im so tired, i just had to go and do yard work for 2 hours, man it feels good to be back inside. Rebecca i kno your probobly really depressed right now and i hope u feel better soon *hugs rebecca* later
ok im not stoned anymore, well today was boring, im watching rat race right now. love ya rebecca *hugs rebecca*
YAY I FINALLY GOT MY SPIFFY NEW MOUSE... ya thats all that i have to write about right now, o an i still love you rebecca (look at the previous post) *hugs rebecca* ill post more later

man i feel so much better right now, thanks a lot for the comments rebecca, i love you so much! *hugs rebecca*...In other news...I should have gotten my new spiffy optical mouse today but ups is gay and cant deliver it on the right day, DAMN THEM AND THEIR SHORT SHORTS

man I'm depressed right now, so depressed I'm posting on this blog lol...well ya my life is depressing right now but I'm sure it will get better sometime in the next 5 years (good outlook, huh?) so ya I'm just trying to be happy right now...man I sound stupid saying this don't I? I need a hug, anyone who wants to leave a comment thingy (as if anyone will) well prove me wrong and post a comment if u care about me (as if anyone does) yep that's it for my blabering about my shitty life that should be better... yep... o ya I get my new mouse that better work tomorrow, ya that's about the only ray of happiness in my life, except rebecca, ok ya that's it now I'm getting tired of typing, I love you rebecca (god I'm so pathetic)

uhh ya im pretty bored so i found something to do, ya im happy b/c im getting my new mouse back from those gay hippies in san fransisco on wendesday, ya thats pretty much it, if uve ever heard of the expression "like a deer under headlights" that sums up part of my life right now, later fools lol jk

yay im happy, lol that was really fun over at your house rebecca, ya no one has been comenting so COMMENT YOU BASTARDS!!! lol jk u dont have to comment if you dont want to, i would like you to comment but ya dont if you dont want to, yep, i love you so much rebecca (you're so cute) *hugs* later everyone

ya today was cool (today being the 10th, ya i kno im lazy so i didnt update till now) damn i just now remembered what i was going to ask rebecca but she already got off so ill have to wait, ya that was pointless to say but thats all ive got to say. i love you sooo much rebecca *hugs* bye

ya well ive been on an emotional rollercoaster today but in the end it all turned out good, which is very good lol, ya its really hard to explain so i wont fry my brain trying to explain it, o and ive decided to have my birthday party sometime this saterday, whenever it is convienent for everyone, ya thats about it, thanks so much rebecca, i love you so much *hugs*

ya well today was fun, got to go see more sexy penguins like myself at moody gardens, ok enough hate mail james, u jelous of me or what? ya well thats about all i did today, o and my new cellphone works and its celly's (rebeccas cellphone) cousin lol, love ya rebecca *hugs* bye

YAY ITS MY BIRTHDAY AND I GOT A CELLPHONE! haha ya i got a bunch of money too but my cellphone doesent work yet, have you thought of anything to say to me on my birthday yet rebecca? (ha u probobly wont read this till later but o well) love ya rebecca *hugs rebecca*
ya today was fun, last day of eight hour a day of marching practice and tommrow is my birthday, yay, ya thats about all ive got to say right this second, love ya rebecca *hugs rebecca*

*sigh* ya today was fun untill i figured out that i was an un interesting piece of crap and thats y ppl ignore me so much, but that was a while ago and now i feel a lot better, love ya rebecca *hugs rebecca*
hah, u were right rebeccca, today was funner than yesterday (or however u said it), ya, thats all ive got to say, almost 2 days till my birthday!, later, love ya rebecca *hugs* bye

damn im still tired but not as tired as i was yesterday, ya im just going to sit here for a while now and wait for ppl to get on so i can talk to them, yep, i love you rebecca *hugs rebecca* lol that was funny at the beginning of band tho, later

god im tired, band is so tiring, but yay i get to stay up late and be lazy the rest of the night, ya im probobly going to have my birthday party this sunday at the mall, (for all of you that say you wouldnt miss it, 2 so far other than me) so ya idk what times yet ill figure that out in a while, well ive got 4 and a half hours till i have to go back to band and im really tired from this morning, yeah... love ya rebecca *hugs rebecca* later everyone

yay 6 days till my birthday, ya well i still dont kno if im going to have a party or something at the mall for it but i at least kno 2 ppl will go besides me so thats good, o check out the spiffy stuff im going to hopefully buy with all the money i get for my birthday urlLink Video Card urlLink New Motherboard urlLink Memory urlLink Spiffy Case ya idk i just got bored and felt like showing ppl all that stuff, ya i want a cellphone too but idk if i can get one but o well, i love you rebecca *hugs rebecca* later
